# contentInsets

**Instance Property**

The amount of space between the content of the section and its boundaries.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentInsets: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets { get set }
```

## Configuring section spacing

- **interGroupSpacing**: The amount of space between the groups in the section.
